text: Oh the memories, I used to play this game all the time. I remember I was able to buy two DS games; I really wanted Mario kart ss but for some odd reason it was more expensive. So I got sonic classic collection and I got this game. Such good memories
author: SonicFan66

text:
My favorite song from the game. Love how relaxing it is.
Also gives me a lot of nostalgia. Not a lot of people played this game, but I guarantee those who did have very fond memories of it :')

author: mbed

text: The first Starfy game to come outside of Japan, this was a simple, competent platformer on the DS. Nothing earth-shattering and too memorable, but sometimes it can be nice to go through an easy game like this one. This theme is probably the one thing I remember the most from it.
author: SupraDarky

text: SupraDarky it is easy until you get to the final boss. Man, I freaking hated that boss.

text: It's fine until that freakin button mash part.

text: If you think it's easy you never tried for the hidden boss.
